   |     ^^ ... also set here
...

   |                    -- not a repeated field
   = note: a non-`repeated` option may be set at most once

...

35 |     optional int32 x2 = 2;
   |     -------------- expected due to this
   = note: expected: scalar type `int32`
              found: array expression
